## CCSelectorCombinedProps.errorProps property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Props applied to the FormHelperText component of the combined country code selector component (a possible error message). See [https://mui.com/material-ui/api/form-helper-text/](https://mui.com/material-ui/api/form-helper-text/) for more information about the MUI's FormHelperText's API.

**Signature:**

```typescript
errorProps?: Partial<FormHelperTextProps> | Record<string, never>;
```
